name: Chicrook
description:
Welcome to Chicrook, a game about a chicken, the cops, and corn!

You use WASD to control this chicken:


Your goal? Escape the police!

The police have many stages, like the FBI and the SWAT!

The more you run, the faster they get! How will you escape? By eating corn, of course!

The more corn you eat, the faster you get!

Also, if your screen starts turning black, it is because your chicken is too far from the police and has gotten bored. You can fix this by clicking rapidly or getting closer to the police.

Will you get to the last stage and find the secret "Turbo'd" ending?

Enjoy!
